name: I’m Bored. What’s Next? | TechCrunch
caption: techcrunch.com
description: It’s just about 2013 and I gotta say, I’m a little bored.    At least, the blogger in me is. As an investor things are just peachy. All this panic about overpriced consumer startups has led to a nice softening of the market (periodic reports of Blubbles are great for that). And other sectors,..
